title.value: Fairness-aware data-driven-based model predictive controller: A study on thermal energy storage in a residential building
title.justification: The title directly presents the main focus of the paper: developing a fairness-aware data-driven model predictive controller for thermal energy storage in residential settings.
title.quote: Fairness-aware data-driven-based model predictive controller: A study on thermal energy storage in a residential building

extractions.description: The paper introduces and investigates a fairness-aware data-driven model predictive controller (MPC) for thermal energy storage systems in residential buildings. The aim is to optimize control strategies while ensuring fairness and accuracy in predictions, demonstrated through a case study involving an electrically heated floor system.

type.justification: The paper focuses on implementing and evaluating a fairness-aware model predictive controller through experimental setup and numerical study, indicating empirical research.
type.quote: The numerical study results show that...

name.justification: The primary research field is focused on thermal energy storage systems in residential buildings, as it is the main application domain discussed and tested in the study.
name.quote: ...a residential building heated by an electrically heated floor (EHF) system, which could be considered as a thermal energy storage (TES) system.

name.justification: DDBMs are crucial components in the study as they form the prediction component of the MPC framework.
name.quote: In the proposed MPC framework, fairness-aware DDBMs constitute the prediction component...

name.justification: Model predictive control is central to the study, aiming to optimize control strategies in building systems.
name.quote: To ensure data-driven-based model predictive controllers (MPCs) provide optimal control strategies...
